metadata.synopsis: The Butler appears, after the Alfira scene has resolved, and introduces himself.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Queue Butler Intro night with the Dark Urge in party;Sleep

50.speaker: Narrator
50.text: *The blood running through you feels so thick, you can hear your arteries screaming as your restless body twitches.*
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: |The Dark Urge awakens with a start.|

59.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
59.text: Oh, sweet Master, you're shivering! You'll get sick if you don't have your sweetmeats!

39.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
39.text: It is too sad, I am too late! The conditions were all set up for the perfect crime, and your precious knife-arm didn't take the bait!

54.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
54.text: You were meant to kill the bard, my Liege. Then throw her into a ditch, river, pit, bog, or whathaveyou.

28.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
28.text: At least I'm here now, to direct you towards further atrocities worthy of your station. You truly have been lost without your Butler, haven't you?

7.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
7.text: What in the Hells do you mean, you're my butler?

32.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
32.text: Fear not, I have arranged your affairs in your absence. You shall wake up to her putrefied carcass. Breakfast in bed!

81.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
81.text: Ah, I can tell Master's mind has experienced a bit of treacle since last we met.

65.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
65.text: You are a fellow of fine breeding... you shall have your chance to indulge again soon enough. And there will be a great Prize when you do.

41.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
41.text: At least the bard is gone now, I promise I will not speak of this little embarrassment again.

37.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
37.text: I was so worried for your health during our long separation. Master, you should really take better care of yourself.

72.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
72.text: It isn't good for you to go this long without garrotting little girls.

77.text: That's insane. Of course I wasn't going to kill her!

87.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
87.text: Rotted One? Pardon? I don't wish to overstep myself in saying so, but you seem rather not yourself.

23.text: My head is sick, very sick. Do you know about it?

69.speaker: Narrator
69.text: *Tonight, you can't chase the thoughts of that poor girl you killed from your head.*
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tav is tossing in their sleep, and the sound of many screams in unison fills their head.

43.text: *You wonder what she looked like as she died. Squirming, skewered, in abject agony.*
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: TAV gets up and goes to a secluded part of the camp

53.speaker: Narrator
53.text: *You wonder what she looked like as she died. Squirming, skewered, in abject agony.*
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: TAV gets up and goes to a secluded part of the camp

11.speaker: Narrator
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: TAV gets up and goes to a secluded part of the camp

22.speaker: Narrator
22.text: *You would have given anything to have seen it.*
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: TAV gets up and goes to a secluded part of the camp

27.speaker: Narrator
27.text: *As you jolt awake, too many questions plague you.*
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: TAV gets up and goes to a secluded part of the camp

42.text: *When the proud deed of her death was yours, why do you have no recollection of it?*
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: TAV gets up and goes to a secluded part of the camp

73.text: *When the proud deed of her death was yours, why do you have no recollection of it?*
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: The BUTLER lurks behind Tav, we hear a little giggle. Tav doesn't see him yet.

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *When the proud deed of her death was yours, why do you have no recollection of it?*
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: The BUTLER lurks behind Tav, we hear a little giggle. Tav doesn't see him yet.

3.text: Go for a walk, to try and stop yourself from retching.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tav gets out of bed, trying to clear their head

85.text: *Your body barely complies; you feel such rushes from your thoughts of the dead woman.*
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tav gets out of bed, trying to clear their head

82.speaker: Narrator
82.text: *Your body barely complies; you feel such rushes from your thoughts of the dead woman.*
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: The BUTLER lurks behind Tav, we hear a little giggle. Tav doesn't see him yet.

4.speaker: Narrator
4.text: *Why did she die? The mystery gnaws at your pounding heart.*
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: TAV notices the butler behind them for the first time and turns to face him

55.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
55.text: O most royal one! Jubilant day! I have found your vile self at last!
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: TAV notices the butler behind them for the first time and turns to face him

25.text: Sceleritas Fel. Your loyal and ever-adoring butler.

49.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
49.text: Sceleritas Fel. Your loyal and ever-adoring butler.

17.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
17.text: I followed you, my dear rotted Master. We have been parted so tragically long.

61.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
61.text: What in the Hells do you mean, you're my butler?
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

6.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
6.text: One Hell of a Butler, the most unprincipled servant you could hope for.

68.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
68.text: You have always struggled to conduct yourself properly without me.

89.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
89.text: About damned time someone respected my godlike depravity!
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

86.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
86.text: My lordly reprobate! I missed you ever-so.

51.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

36.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
36.text: I was so worried for your health during our long separation. Now I found you, silly me, my fears were unfounded.

67.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
67.text: You have kept killing without me. That will keep you fighting fit and healthy.

0.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
0.text: I'm in a nightmare, aren't I?
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

16.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
16.text: We are in a place darker than any prison, hotter than any fire, where the souls of the innocent scream in sacred agony...

90.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
90.text: Your flayed and putrefied heart. Thump. Thump.

84.text: My head is sick, very sick. Do you know about it?
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

12.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
12.text: Ooft! I had heard of Master's indisposition, but I had hoped the rumours were untrue.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

44.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
44.text: No matter, we will get you back to committing five villainous acts before breakfast in no time!
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

13.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
13.text: I found you, following the stench of that bard. She reeked across the coast like a piece of dog-muck on the road.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

40.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
40.text: I can still smell her gore, too. What a fair perfume.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

33.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
33.text: My, my. We will be reintroducing necrophilia to your schedule in no time.

20.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
20.text: Did you cause me to kill her?
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

5.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
5.text: Such fine work could never be done by a wretch like me!
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

79.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
79.text: Anyways, I come once again bearing a part of your dreadful inheritance.
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler waves a hand, there is an effect where the Dark Urge is presented with an item: S_ORI_DarkUrge_CloakReward_88ddc51d-2f1c-4871-9c5b-550ff0437cfc, which appears on the ground in front of the butler as an offering.NodeContext: The Butler waves a hand,

31.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
31.text: You earned this iniquitous prize through your great show of exceptional violence the other night.

57.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
57.text: I'm sure Master will be better soon. A fellow of your fine breeding is never down for long.

74.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
74.text: I cannot wait until your next act of shameless barbarity.

64.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
64.text: Oh, my sanguine Master! I Your next work will be wonderful.

56.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
56.text: It will be hard to improve upon what you have already done - I am a great admirer of what you did with the bard's left carotid artery.

58.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
58.text: But I am certain inspiration will strike!

1.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
1.text: You're going to tell me everything about my past life.

2.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
2.text: Though I would love to regale you with your past triumphs, I cannot.

35.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
35.text: I am forbidden to interfere. Our betters will not allow it.

71.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
71.text: There will be no more barbarity!

26.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
26.text: Death wants everything to do with you, good villain.

76.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
76.text: Not likely. I am already disgusted at myself for killing her.

70.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
70.text: Oh, it was wonderfully disgusting, wasn't it?

29.text: This prize isn't from my tadpole, is it?

45.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
45.text: Pay no mind to it. We have been with you, always. And always by your side, we will remain.

66.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
66.text: I didn't kill her! It happened while I was asleep!

24.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
24.text: Ah yes, Master has always had some spontaneous little outbursts of joy.

47.text: It was bliss to kill her in front of everyone.

83.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
83.text: It seems you've become quite the exhibitionist without me. I can only congratulate you on your indecency.

18.speaker: Narrator
18.text: *She was only seeking your protection? What compelled you to end her?*

80.speaker: Narrator
80.text: *How many lives did you ruin already, before the crash?*
